channel.title: [317] Hardcoding RAW folder for cache
channel.description: does anyone know how/have a tut on how to hardcode in a raw folder for cache because theres no 317 cache editor that actually works for what i need it to do (pack item/npc models) please help ASAP thanks

item.title: [317] Hardcoding RAW folder for cache
item.dc:creator: @AmnestyV2 AmnestyV2
item.description:
@AmnestyV2 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:552248”][quote author=AmnestyV2 link=topic=671165.msg4488469#msg4488469 date=1435789385]
so where would i place the model files in the cache with this calling method?

EDIT:

sorry i just now read this sorry for ignorance lol thank you sk8erdude461

P.S how can i convert .dat’s to .gz?
[/quote]
Find a download for gzip. drag the .dat’s onto the gzip program
Don’t do more than like ~200 at a time though…[/quote]

thank you for the help

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Hardcoding RAW folder for cache
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There’s no need to use item preloading.

If you want to pack items into the cache, use this:

rune-server.ee

Index Repacking

Rune-Server

Just make sure the file names are in this format: modelid.gz
no .dat.gz

Read full topic
